import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const DetailScreen = () => { const params = useParams() const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ 'id': 1 }) console.log(params.id) const findUserById = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(userDetails => setUserDetails(userDetails)) useEffect(findUserById, []) const [post, setPost] = useState('') const [album, setAlbum] = useState('') const findAlbums = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums/`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(album => setAlbum(album)) const albumByThisUser = Object.values(album).filter(a => a.userId === userDetails.id) useEffect(findAlbums, []) return ( <>

    Basic Information

{userDetails.id}

{userDetails.name}

{userDetails.username}

{userDetails.email}

{userDetails.phone}

{userDetails.website}

{userDetails?.company?.name}

{userDetails?.address?.street}, {userDetails?.address?.suite}, {userDetails?.address?.city}

{userDetails?.address?.zipcode}

User Post
{/*expand to show search bar, create comment button and post new comments*/}
{/*expand to show album list, on click each album to show photos*/}
User Album
    { albumByThisUser.map(album =>
  • {album.title}
    • ) }
) } export default DetailScreen
